long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
X2MU - Connect with X and manage your social tokens

Features:
- Connect your X (Twitter) account
- Manage your social tokens
- Interact with Web3 content
- Secure wallet management
